content.text: How TO - Position Text Over an Image
Learn how to place text over an image.
content.html: Learn how to place text over an image.

content.text: How To Place Text in Image

content.code:
Bottom Left
 
Top Left
 
Top Right
 
Bottom Right
 
Centered
content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <img src="img_snow_wide.jpg" alt="Snow" style="width:100%;">
  <div class="bottom-left">Bottom Left</div>
  <div class="top-left">Top Left</div>
  <div class="top-right">Top Right</div>
  <div class="bottom-right">Bottom Right</div>
  <div class="centered">Centered</div>
</div>

syntaxHighlighting.text: /* Container holding the image and the text */

position: relative;
    
  text-align: center;  color: white;

syntax_highlighting.text: /* Container holding the image and the text */

position: relative;
    
  text-align: center;  color: white;

content.code_html:
/* Container holding the image and the text */
.container {
  position: relative;
  text-align: center;
  color: white;
}

/* Bottom left text */
.bottom-left {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  left: 16px;
}

/* Top left text */
.top-left {
  position: absolute;
  top: 8px;
  left: 16px;
}

/* Top right text */
.top-right {
  position: absolute;
  top: 8px;
  right: 16px;
}

/* Bottom right text */
.bottom-right {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  right: 16px;
}

/* Centered text */
.centered {
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}

position: relative;
    
  text-align: center;  color: white;
